categories: Category:Theed Palace Space Vessel Engineering Corps products

nodes.text: The Naboo NB-1T Royal Bomber was the successor of the NB-1S Royal Bomber.

The NB-1T Royal Bomber was a bomber used by the Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps and incorporated a separate seat for the bombardier. The Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps preferred Human judgment over that of targeting computers. In an emergency situation when the pilot was knocked out, the bombardier could transfer piloting functions to his station. The craft was equipped with proton bombs.
The NB-1T Royal Bomber appeared in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2003 expansion pack as the "advanced bomber" unit for the Naboo civilization.
